home.description: I develop websites and create webdesign models. Animated by visuals, I use my experience in UI & UX in my realizations. I master: HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript and React.
I create digital illustrations and concept art. Most of the time I create environments, but also like to imagine characters.
I love experiment and explore different mediums. I practice paiting (oil, watercolor, acrylic), pencil, pyrography etc...
Various projects that I have been able to realize. Graphic design, UI&UX, video games, board games, photography, object design, etc.

dev.description: TeKiToa is a show to discover new streamers created by MaucSama. The website of the show being already existing, the mission was to rework the accessibility of the website and the user experience. Creation of Figma models and prototypes.
Kasa is a school project. Integrate the model in React including dropdowns and image sliders.
Kanap is a school project. Project in Javascript which consisted in making the front part. Display of the different products, their product page, management of the cart and the form.
La Panthère is a school project. The work consisted in correcting the website and improving the SEO.
OhMyFood is a school project. I had to realize the integration of the model in HTML with CSS animations.
Booki is a school project. I had to realize the integration of the model in HTML and CSS.

description: - Web integration, CSS Animations, API Management, SEO Referencing
- Disciplines: UI/UX, Concept Art, Digital Painting, 3D Modeling, Texturing, Lighting, Fx, Composition, Use of game engines
- Group Projects: Card Game, Board Game, Shoot 'em up, Dungeon Crawler, Tower Defense, Adventure/Puzzle Game
- Disciplines: Design and Applied Arts, Art History, DTP (Desktop Publishing), Design and Arts in English
- Creative approach projects, plastic and technological practices
